attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain in 2007 is more like a Fascist state than a Democracy. Cameras everywhere , secret police, indirect taxation making life harder than ever before for the lower middle working class, but sweeter for the rich. The road pricing act will make family travel for pleasure or for family get-togethers impossible - except for the better off. I have always voted Labour. But where now is a labour party to vote for?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
